metadata.title: Social Media & Visual Content Framework
metadata.description: Complete guide for creating consistent social media visuals using the Tailark Pro design system

testimonial_card_social.purpose: Extract hero testimonials into shareable social posts
testimonial_card_social.layout: Card-based with company logo, metric highlight, and quote

design_elements.background: Use dark premium gradient (dark-purple-blue or dark-teal-navy)
design_elements.metric_highlight: Large percentage or statistic in accent color (#14B8A6 teal or #A855F7 purple)
design_elements.cta_element: 'Read full story' link or arrow to case study URL

metric_highlight_card.focus: Single metric (99.9%, 24/7, 62% reduction) with supporting context

design_approach.call_to_action: Subtle 'Learn how' or URL at bottom

case_study_carousel.purpose: Multi-slide social carousel highlighting customer journey

design_continuity.slide_1: Problem statement in dark gradient background
design_continuity.consistent_palette: All slides use same color system (primary blue #2563EB, accents)

design_pattern.label: Small caps or regular sm text

linkedin.color_usage: Dark premium cards for impact, light cards for contrast

instagram.design_approach: Bold gradients + large metrics + minimal text
instagram.color_palette: Use purple (#A855F7) and teal (#14B8A6) accents for visual pop
instagram.stories_format: Full-bleed gradient background, stacked text, 15-20px safe margins

facebook.design_consideration: Works well with light backgrounds + company logos
facebook.text_on_image_limit: Keep text under 20% of image area for better reach

tiktok.pacing: 3-5 second scenes, rapid cuts for engagement

email.card_style: Use light testimonial cards with subtle borders
email.metric_callout: Highlight key result in email body
email.cta_button: Styled with primary blue (#2563EB), 44px minimum height
email.responsive_behavior: Single column on mobile, cards stack vertically

template_1_customer_win.example: Stripe logo + '65% Faster' + 'Prime implemented our streaming optimization suite...' + 'Read Story'

visual_breakdown.section_3: Testimonial: 16px regular, white text, 30px line height
visual_breakdown.section_4: CTA link: 14px semibold, teal accent color

template_2_before_after.structure: [Split screen] Left: Problem | Right: Solution + Metric

visual_approach.right_half: Solution + metric on dark gradient background

template_3_testimonial_highlight.structure: [Dark card with gradient] [Logo top] [Metric + Quote] [2 Supporting metrics bottom]
template_3_testimonial_highlight.use_case: LinkedIn carousel slides, email feature sections
template_3_testimonial_highlight.layout: Vertical card, 400-500px height, metrics in grid at bottom

template_4_metric_callout.design_flexibility: Works as square, vertical, or horizontal post

color_application_by_context.primary_metric_highlight: Use #14B8A6 teal for key performance indicators
color_application_by_context.secondary_emphasis: Use #A855F7 purple for supporting metrics or CTA
color_application_by_context.text_on_dark: Use white (text-white) with 80% opacity for secondary text

typography_for_social.cta_text: Inter 14px, weight 600, accent color, uppercase optional

generation_workflow.step_1_extract_data: Pull metric, quote, company name from customer data
generation_workflow.step_2_choose_template: Select template based on platform (carousel, single card, etc.)
generation_workflow.step_3_apply_colors: Apply color scheme from design.json color_system
generation_workflow.step_4_set_typography: Use typography scales for visual hierarchy
generation_workflow.step_6_export_formats: Export for each platform (1200x627 LinkedIn, 1080x1080 Instagram, etc.)
generation_workflow.step_8_schedule: Use scheduling tool to batch-post across platforms

from_design_json_use: Color palette (neutral scale, brand colors, gradients)
Typography scales (font sizes, weights, line heights)
design_system_integration.maintain_consistency: All social media visuals should reference color_system and typography sections from design.json
design_system_integration.scalability: Templates can be programmatically generated from customer data JSON using Figma API or v0.dev
